channel.title: CVE Feed for Sygnoos -- Popup Builder (WordPress plugin)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Sygnoos -- Popup Builder (WordPress plugin)

item.title: CVE-2022-29495|2024-08-03T06:26:05.883Z -- sygnoos -- popup%20builder%20%28wordpress%20plugin%29
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Sygnoos Popup Builder plugin <= 4.1.11 at WordPress allows an attacker to update plugin settings.

item.title: CVE-2022-32289|2024-08-03T07:39:50.919Z -- sygnoos -- popup%20builder%20%28wordpress%20plugin%29
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Sygnoos Popup Builder plugin <= 4.1.0 at WordPress leading to popup status change.
